lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The market should include a comprehensive range of futures and options trading so Tokyo can develop into a real global money centre where a variety of risk-hedging instruments is available, the proposal said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Araki said he had no intention of limiting prospective market participants to banks but was willing to accept those from wider business circles, the sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Banking sources said they expect that initially the currency futures would be dollar-yen and interest futures would include Japanese domestic yen certificates of deposit, three-month Eurodollar deposits and 20-year U.
